pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semisupervised Document Scaling with Word-Embedding Models // A word embeddings-based semisupervised model for document scaling Watanabe (2020) doi:10.1080/19312458.2020.1832976. LSS allows users to analyze large and complex corpora on arbitrary dimensions with seed words exploiting efficiency of word embeddings (SVD, Glove). It can generate word vectors on a users-provided corpus or incorporate a pre-trained word vectors.
